Text:
video's! rarely do them...
but i did a google search and a few pop'd up. Hillary Duff Live Torrent... try that
bubanee ur fuckin' awesome! But if u upload any Hillary Duff to ANYONE.... well, I'll just hit myself!
track 3: The Mystery Zone seems to end prematurely. 4 was ok, haven't reached the rest yet.

02. Is Love Forever?,
03. The Mystery Zone
Both seem to end prematurely...hey Bubanee what happened,you are one of the best....
Anyone having the same problem...???

The tracks are intended to end prematurely. 

"Their go-to trick for the first half of the album is to include bits of sound that abruptly cut off, usually sung phrases that drop entirely out of the mix mid-syllable. This may be aggravating for some listeners, but this counterintuitive move makes sense in context, indicating distraction and tongue-tied indecision. This is a perfect example of the group's genius as a studio band: They get very cerebral in arranging their material, but every clever move is entirely in the service of maximizing physical impact and gut-level response." -- Pitchfork review
Thanx a lot to planetnews for clearing the confusion...!!!

Super fast download. I'm 60 years old and the first time I saw this band I thought WTF was that. But then I saw them again and really listened and they blew my mind. Britt Daniel is a f'n genius! Thanks bubanee!
